translation.en: [voice] Vampling.
-[voice in dream] Vampling. -[shouts]
Just a bad dream, Mr. Rutabaga.
Gotta lay off three-spice pizzas.
Happy Birthday. Day 4,745 of my unremarkable life.
translation.de: Alles Gute zum Geburtstag! Tag 4.745 meines unbesonderen Lebens.

translation.en: [dog] Wait for it.
The first time's always the best.
translation.de: Das erste Mal ist das Beste.

translation.en: -Ha-ha. -[mother] Honey? Time to get up.
translation.de: Zeit aufzustehen. Heute ist das Musical-Vorsprechen.

translation.en: The school musical auditions are today.
translation.de: Zeit aufzustehen. Heute ist das Musical-Vorsprechen. Ach, Menschen.

translation.en: Ah-ha. Humans. [sneezes]

translation.de: MYTHICS - BLENDED - DIE JÄGER - VAMPLING SPAGHETTI! WAS AUCH IMMER KLASSE!

translation.en: Three, two, go time.
-[boy] Here we go. -[beeping]
Brah, smoke bomb? Cruel.
My wings don't work with smoke on them.
Well, that's how you catch a Hugar.
You're gonna hunt every Blended who wants to live as a human?
translation.de: Jagst du alle Blendeds, die als Mensch leben?

translation.en: Yes.
Mythics, Blendeds whatever.
Whoa. Hey. What are you doing?
Yep.
Man what, are you, like, 13?
Go be an influencer like every other kid your age.
Please. The world is bigger than your phone.
translation.de: Die Welt ist größer als das Handy.

translation.en: Besides, I come from a long line of hunters.
translation.de: Ich stamme von Jägern ab. Ich bin dafür geboren.

translation.en: It's what I was born to do. Capture and dispose of monsters.
translation.de: Ich stamme von Jägern ab. Ich bin dafür geboren. -Monster fangen und beseitigen. -Durchbrich den Kreislauf.

translation.en: Ever think of breaking the cycle?
Huh? What do you think? -[cackles] -You could be a hero.
Don't do it, man. Whoa.
[boy] It must have been the three-spice pizza.
Last time I had one, I dreamt I was trapped in a washing machine on spin cycle.
translation.de: Ich hing danach im Traum mal im Schleudergang fest.

translation.en: [girl] Rainey talking? Talking! No way, no how. No dream.
I woke up floating above my bed.
Maybe I can fly.
Sick. And come here. Check this out.
translation.de: Krank! Und komm her. Sieh dir das an.

translation.en: Nah. You're messing with me. That's obvs a filter.
translation.de: Du veralberst mich. Das ist ein Filter.

translation.en: Argh. It was real!
[boy] Whoa, Carmie.
See? That is what I'm talking about.
Maybe I'm a superhero.
The first one without a tragic origin story.
translation.de: -Die erste ohne tragische Herkunft. -Fass nichts an.

translation.en: Carmie, don't touch anything. Don't kick anything.
translation.de: -Die erste ohne tragische Herkunft. -Fass nichts an. -Nichts treten. Keiner darf dich sehen. -Ich will gesehen werden.

translation.en: You can't be seen. No. I want to be seen.
translation.de: -Nichts treten. Keiner darf dich sehen. -Ich will gesehen werden.

translation.en: Girl power. Tween excellence. Adopted kids make the world spin.
translation.de: Frauenpower. Tween-Stärke. Adoptierte Kinder verändern die Welt.

translation.en: I have superpowers.
Leanna is going to be so jelly. I'm gonna, like, crush this audition.
translation.de: Leanna wird neidisch sein. Das Casting wird super laufen.

translation.en: And I'm maybe just going to, like, float right over her.
There's no floating. There's no anything until we figure out what happened to you.
translation.de: Kein Schweben. Nichts, bis wir wissen, was passiert.

translation.en: Well, maybe what happened to me was so that I can finally have a thing.
translation.de: Was passiert, ist, dass ich endlich ein Markenzeichen habe.

translation.en: Superpowers.
You're not getting it. If you've been given powers, you've also been given enemies.
translation.de: Du verstehst es nicht. Wenn man Kräfte hat, hat man auch Feinde.

translation.en: It's how it works.
translation.de: Du verstehst es nicht. Wenn man Kräfte hat, hat man auch Feinde. So läuft das.

translation.en: A voice in my dream did keep saying, "Vampling."
translation.de: Eine Stimme in meinem Traum sagte "Vampling".

translation.en: "Vampling"?
What does that mean? What does that mean?
♪ They're trying to ride my wave Got 'em coasting ♪
[girl] Carmela? Yay! Audition day.
[gasps] Who spilt water on the floor? People, please. A little courtesy.

translation.en: It's gonna be hazardous dancing next to her.
As friends, Carmela, I--
Uh, she hates that name. Carm, Carmie? All good. Never Carmela.

translation.en: I won't remember that.
You are, like, so brave to even audition. Like, why?

translation.en: Wardrobe, makeup, an audience staring at me for 90 minutes.

translation.en: It'll be fun.
Fun?
Really? I've been practising for months.
Mm-hmm. Carmela, I've trained my entire life for this moment. Not a bit of it was fun.

translation.en: Acting, voice and dance lessons since I was five.
translation.de: Schauspiel, Gesang, Tanz seit ich fünf war.

translation.en: I won Miss Kramposki's Deli Queen pageant three years in a row.

translation.en: Well, I can do all the TikTok dances.
The first parts
kinda. [laughs]
I was chosen most likely to succeed at my kindergarten graduation.
Wow. That's a lot of pressure to live up to.
Never, ever speak to me again.
Good luck. Kidding. Not kidding.
-You sure about this? -Yes. This is my moment.
Hi. I'm Kev.
Let's see what we have.
-Okay. Let's go. -[dance music plays]
[Leanna] Don't try to follow me.
[teacher] Five, six, seven, eight.

Who pushed me?
-[shouts] -She's clumsy.
Ever since she was a kid.

translation.en: -It's all good. Let's go. -[music resumes]
Let's go and see who makes the show.
Honestly, what were you thinking?

translation.en: Mrs. Johnson, if adults knew that 98% of the time the answer to that question is
translation.de: Mrs. Johnson, wüssten Erwachsene, dass die Antwort in 98 % der Fälle lautet:

translation.en: "I wasn't thinking," would they keep asking?
translation.de: "Ich hab nicht gedacht", fragen sie weiter?

translation.en: I'm not playing this game with you, Carmie. Not even on your birthday.
translation.de: Da spiel ich nicht mit. Nicht mal an deinem Geburtstag.

translation.en: Vice-Principal Chase will be with you shortly.
translation.de: Frau Chase ruft dich gleich rein.

translation.en: -We gotta go. I think I know-- -Mr. Gardner?
translation.de: SCHULLEITUNG -Wir müssen los. Ich weiß… -Mr. Gardner.

translation.en: Kev. Just Kev.
translation.de: -Wir müssen los. Ich weiß… -Mr. Gardner. -Kev. Nur Kev. -Was machst du hier?

translation.en: What are you doing here?
Hoping to prevent catastrophic events from occurring to my friend,
translation.de: Eine Katastrophe verhindern, für meine Freundin,

translation.en: the school, the world.
That's nice, but you're going to do it out of this office.
translation.de: Schön. Aber nicht in diesem Büro. Tschüs.

translation.en: Now, Kev!
People always talk about nature versus nurture
translation.de: NATUR ODER UMWELT MIT UNS KANNST DU IMMER REDEN. Es geht immer darum, ob Natur oder Umwelt dominiert.

translation.en: and which one dominates.
translation.de: Es geht immer darum, ob Natur oder Umwelt dominiert.

translation.en: What no one ever talks about is what happens when the natural order mixes with the unnatural order.
translation.de: Was, wenn sich die natürliche und die unnatürliche Ordnung mischen.

translation.en: That would be something to talk about.
When you said unnatural, did you mean supernatural?
No idea.
translation.de: Keine Ahnung. Dinge gehen bei mir direkt vom Hirn aus dem Mund.

translation.en: Things go into my brain and immediately exit my mouth.
translation.de: Keine Ahnung. Dinge gehen bei mir direkt vom Hirn aus dem Mund. Andere nennen es seltsam. Ich eine Gabe.

translation.en: Most people say it's weird. I say it's a gift.
translation.de: Andere nennen es seltsam. Ich eine Gabe.

translation.en: So, you weren't talking to that kid?
translation.de: Du hast nicht mit ihm geredet?

translation.en: I wasn't not talking to him. [chuckles]
translation.de: Du hast nicht mit ihm geredet? Ich habe nicht nicht mit ihm geredet.

translation.en: The name's Madison. Happy Birthday.
How did you know it was my birthday?
Miss Henley?
Ooh. [thuds]
I'm okay. New shoes.

translation.en: This isn't over.
[Chase] Now, Miss Henley.
I didn't do anything, okay? They were the ones who act--

translation.en: Mmm.
translation.de: Ich habe nichts getan, ok? Sie haben… Sie sagen, du hast Leanna geschubst.

translation.en: They say you pushed Leanna off the stage.
translation.de: Sie sagen, du hast Leanna geschubst.

translation.en: [Carmie] Can we just call it circumstances outside of my control?
I'm sure they were. Regardless, I need to put on a musical.

translation.en: [Carmie] Musical.
Yeah, yeah. Let's get into it. Do some, what do they called? Rehearsals.

translation.en: Bring in the audience and I'll own it. Whatever "it" is. What is "it"? [chuckles]

translation.en: You and Leanna clearly don't get along, and that is a problem that I don't want to deal with.
translation.de: Du verstehst dich nicht mir Leanna. Probleme brauche ich nicht.

translation.en: Well, we're on the same page, and I
translation.de: Wir sind uns einig, und ich…

translation.en: Especially because she is a trained singer and dancer.
translation.de: Sie ist ausgebildete Sängerin und Tänzerin.

translation.en: And you, while enthusiastic, are not trained.
translation.de: Du bist motiviert, aber nicht ausgebildet.

translation.en: Oh, I'm trained. Yeah. Tap, jazz, hip-hop.
translation.de: Ich bin ausgebildet. Steppen, Jazz, Hip-Hop.

translation.en: I've been studying YouTube. Yeah, for months. I've got this.
translation.de: Ich lerne seit Monaten mit YouTube. Ich kann das.

translation.en: Say nothing! Say nothing.
I'm sure you think so, but I have a decision to make.
translation.de: Das denkst du sicher, aber ich muss eine Entscheidung treffen.

translation.en: Don't worry. We'll be fine without Leanna.
translation.de: Keine Sorge, wir kommen ohne Leanna klar.

translation.en: Not the decision I was thinking.
I'll let you know if you're going to be a part of the musical or not.

translation.en: -Oh, but I can-- -Great. We're done.
-What? -[Kev] You didn't say anything?
How could I? She was telling me I might've blown my chance to be in the musical.

translation.en: That's not your biggest problem.
Really? Because I want No. I need to be in it.
translation.de: Ich will… Nein. Ich muss dabei sein.

translation.en: What's wrong with one of us, the outsiders, slightly uncool kids, not really talented, succeeding?

translation.en: Stop. Listen. I remember where I heard the word "Vampling".
translation.de: Halt! Ich weiß, woher ich "Vampling" kenne.

translation.en: -So, it's a thing? Vampling? -Yes.
People just don't kick trash cans across the street.
translation.de: Ja. Menschen schießen Eimer nicht so weit.

translation.en: Doesn't explain you blasting Leanna off the stage,
translation.de: Leanna fliegt von der Bühne, du schwebst…

translation.en: What? I'm 13. May be possible.
Not possible. Something in you has changed and given you these powers.

translation.en: Like Zendaya?
She doesn't have superpowers.
Really? Because if you know, you know. If you don't, you never will.
translation.de: Ehrlich? Wenn du es weißt, weißt du es.

translation.en: [Kev] I'm hitting the stacks. Excellent. Who's your friend?
translation.de: -Ich geh ins Archiv. -Gut. Wer ist sie?

translation.en: It's Carmie. You've met her, like, a hundred times.
translation.de: Du hast Carmie schon hundertmal getroffen.

translation.en: But always ignores me.
Maybe, maybe not.
Don't touch the sleeved books. Only Kev.
He respects the art and he knows how to deal with tape.
translation.de: Er respektiert die Kunst und versteht Klebeband.

translation.en: You! Kid!
Nice try, but back, back, back. Back, back. Stop.
Forward. Back Back.
Does this always happen?
-Yeah. -Okay.
Yes. Good.
Good. The comic returned. That's good. You? Still not good.

translation.en: You're banned for life.
Now, be gone!
-[Carmie] I found it. -Put those down there.
You know these are just comics, right? That's what they want you to think.

translation.en: Who's "they"? There's always a "they" running things.
They have used comic books to send secret messages for a century.
-To who? -To them.
I'm not even going to ask who "them" are.
translation.de: Ich frag nicht, wer das ist.

translation.en: -Buck Rogers, 1929. -Okay.
Why was it that the first rocket-ship design -ever came from a comic book? -I have it.

translation.en: So they could get the plans across the country without anyone knowing.

translation.en: Do you know about that? [laughs]
Of course you don't. Nobody does who doesn't read comics.

translation.en: Ah. Here we go.

They're legendary monsters who came before man.
So, I'm a monster?
No. But you could be a Blended,
translation.de: Nein, aber du könntest ein Blended sein.

translation.en: the offspring of a Mythic and a human.
translation.de: Kind eines Mythics und eines Menschen.

translation.en: Grab me the magnifying glass.
Uh, super speed. Nice.
I am going to dance circles around Leanna.

translation.en: This is the best day of my life! [squeals]
Carm?
"Vampling:
"the Blended offspring of a vampire,
and their powers are super speed," check,
"enhanced strength," check.
"energy blast "
-[chuckles] The best. Check. -Yep.
-"Fly." -Fly?
Really? [gasps, thuds]
Scratch flying. We'll put "float."
I can't be a Vampling. My parents are normal, kinda.
translation.de: Das kann nicht sein, mit normalen Eltern.

translation.en: Your bio parents? What do we even know about them?
translation.de: -Halbwegs. -Deine leiblichen Eltern? Was wissen wir über sie?

translation.en: My parents adopted me when I was three months old. I have no idea.
translation.de: Ich wurde mit drei Monaten adoptiert. Nichts.

translation.en: So, one of your birth parents could've been a vampire.
translation.de: Einer von ihnen könnte Vampir sein.

translation.en: That's impossible.
I'd say it's pretty undeniable.
"A Vampling receives their powers on their 13th year."
Happy Birthday, by the way.
I guess I always thought I was a little different, but never thought I was a freak.
translation.de: Ich hielt mich immer für anders, aber nie für einen Freak.

translation.en: It's my dad. I gotta go.
You're not a freak. You're my best friend.
translation.de: Kein Freak. Du bist meine beste Freundin.

translation.en: [comic store owner] So, you just moved to town?
You always ask so many questions?
-I just asked one. -That's a lot.
Okay. Show me what you think you have. Maybe.
Is communicating a difficult thing for you?
Is that another question?
Yes. No. Maybe. I That wasn't a question.
translation.de: -Noch eine Frage? -Ja. Nein. Vielleicht. Ich… Keine Frage.

translation.en: [clears throat] I heard you are
the best at what I do.
Hey, kiddo. You got to answer your texts.
translation.de: Hey. Du musst auf Nachrichten antworten.

translation.en: I know. Sorry. I'm just distracted.
Ah. Well, you want me to pick you up? I mean, your birthday tacos are here, and they are a-taco-ing.
translation.de: Soll ich dich abholen? Die Tacos tacoen schon fleißig.

translation.en: No. I'm good. See you soon.
Nature-versus-nurture girl. What up?
Sorry. I didn't see you. I thought someone or something
translation.de: Hab dich nicht gesehen. Ich dachte, mir folgt wer, aber vielleicht nicht.

translation.en: was following me, but maybe not. I don't even know.
translation.de: Ich dachte, mir folgt wer, aber vielleicht nicht.

translation.en: Sometimes I think people are following me when they're not,
translation.de: Ich denke grundlos, Leute folgen mir.

translation.en: and then, sometimes, people are following me
translation.de: Ich denke grundlos, Leute folgen mir. Aber manchmal folgen sie mir doch.

translation.en: when I think they're not. So, I don't know.
translation.de: Aber manchmal folgen sie mir doch.

translation.en: -You always talk this fast? -Yes, I do.
Because life goes fast and you have no idea
translation.de: Das Leben ist kurz, keiner weiß, was kommt.

translation.en: what's going to happen next, even if "next" is what you want, which in my life has never been the case
translation.de: Selbst wenn man will. Wollte ich nie.

translation.en: The name's Madison. Remember?
Sorry. Carmie. Nice to officially meet you.
translation.de: Sorry. Carmie. Freut mich, dich kennenzulernen.

translation.en: My mom and I just moved here. It's her restaurant back there.
translation.de: Mom und ich sind neu hier. Unser Restaurant.

translation.en: Oh. That must be nice. You can eat whatever you want.
translation.de: Cool. Du isst, was du willst.

translation.en: -No. It doesn't work like that. -Oh.
Those girls you drenched at school were pretty upset.
translation.de: Die Mädchen in der Schule waren sauer.

translation.en: They had a lot to say about you.
translation.de: Sie haben viel über dich gesagt.

translation.en: It's a long story.
Well, curious minds want to know.
Have you ever wanted to be someone special,
not just an outsider looking in?
Well, today, I had my chance to be special, and I blew it.
translation.de: Heute war meine Chance. Ich habe es vermasselt.

translation.en: Well, there's always second chances. Besides, being an outsider kind of makes you cooler.
translation.de: Es gibt immer eine zweite Chance. Außerdem sind Außenseiter cooler.

translation.en: Impossible.
Joan of Arc. Greta Thunberg. Zendaya.
All outsiders trailblazing new paths.
[Carmie] I want to be like all of them.
translation.de: Außenseiterinnen, die neue Wege gehen. Ich will sein wie sie.

translation.en: [Madison chuckles] Exactly.
You get it. But what if you turned out to be someone you never thought you were?

translation.en: That would be so dope. I hope I have that problem.
translation.de: Das wäre so cool. Das Problem hätte ich gern.

translation.en: Wait. What were we talking about?
Listen. We can't change who we are,
translation.de: Wir können nicht ändern, wer wir sind.

translation.en: and when you really think about it, would you want to?
Did you just
Uh, did you did you just
translation.de: Hast du gerade… Hast du… Wie?

translation.en: How?
Uh, adrenalin. Lots of adrenalin.
But what I think I just saw isn't possible.
translation.de: Was ich gesehen habe, ist unmöglich.

translation.en: Look. I have to go.
But I mean, you just saved my life.
translation.de: Du hast mir das Leben gerettet. Können wir reden?

translation.en: -Can we talk about this? -No.
translation.de: Du hast mir das Leben gerettet. Können wir reden? Nein. Ja.

translation.en: Yes.
I don't know, okay? Uh, I can't be late.
And the tacos are a-taco-ing, so
translation.de: Ich darf nicht zu spät kommen, die Tacos!

translation.en: [gasps] This isn't over!
-[girl 1] I would love that. -[girl 2] Okay.
-[girl 1] Yeah. -[indistinct chatter]
That was so sick.
It's my birthday. All good.
-[girls laughing] -[phone chimes]
Oh. Where am I?

translation.en: Understudy. Understudy.
Understudy!
I made it kind of.
Hmm. Thought I'd gotten rid of all these.
Kev? I'll be in my office. Lock up when you're all finished.
translation.de: Kev! Ich bin im Büro. Schließ ab, wenn du fertig bist.

translation.en: -Got it. -And, uh, Kev?
-Don't forget your phone. -[Kev] Oh.
Thank you.
You really want to explain to people why you can fly?
translation.de: Du willst den Leuten sagen, wie du fliegst?

translation.en: I knew you could talk. I thought I was hearing things this morning. I always could.
translation.de: -Du redest echt. Ich dachte, ich spinne. -Schon immer.

translation.en: Now that you understand me, check your teeth.
translation.de: Jetzt verstehst du mich: Guck mal, deine Zähne.

translation.en: What?
Your fangs. A dead giveaway.
I really am a Vampling!
Pull those beauties in. Taco time!
translation.de: Zieh die Süßen ein. Zeit für Tacos!

translation.en: You are going to take a lot of getting used to.
translation.de: An dich muss ich mich gewöhnen.

translation.en: [Rainey] Out of my way! Out of my way!
There's my birthday girl.
[both] We're hungry.
Carmie, meet Dylan. He just moved in down the block. His mom's working tonight, so I invited him for dinner.
translation.de: Dylan ist gerade hergezogen. Weil seine Mom arbeitet, lud ich ihn ein.

translation.en: Hey, Dylan. Welcome to the neighbourhood.
Happy Birthday, Carmie. Thirteen is a big year.
translation.de: Alles Gute. Dreizehn ist ein wichtiges Jahr.

translation.en: Yeah.
So, how was the first day of the rest of your life, honey?
translation.de: Wie war der erste Tag vom Rest deines Lebens?

translation.en: I believe I broke my unremarkable streak.
Oh. Well, birthday tacos for the birthday girl. Let's go.
translation.de: Meine unauffällige Zeit ist vorbei. Geburtstagstacos fürs Geburtstagskind.

translation.en: [mother] Mm-hmm. Yes.
Dylan, why don't you sit over here with us?
So cute when so tiny.
No way I'm staying in here.
You can't keep us from the humans.
That kid is weird
but he delivers.
So many more to catch.
-[cackles] -Help!
